system.Text:
__When you face an extended or complex challenge__, name your objective and choose a rank as appropriate to the situation.

  * You have a clear advantage: Troublesome
  * You are ready to act: Dangerous
  * You are unprepared or outmatched: Formidable

Then, activate a 4-segment tension clock and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.7bbacec9ac8d8d09]{Face Danger} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.03595d7546a1353f]{Secure an Advantage} to take action.

Trigger.Text: When you face an extended or complex challenge...
